text: A body of water or waterbody is any collection of water on a planet's surface. A body of water can be still (like a lake) or moving (like a river). Bodies of water include the following types: *Bay *Canal *Creek *Estuary *Fjord *Glacier *Gulf *Harbor *Ice cap *Ice sheet *Lagoon *Lake *Ocean *Pond *Reservoir *River *Sea *Stream *Tide pool ==References==
title: Body of water
